comments: This professor is useless. She teaches soemthing and then tells us a week later, that its wrong. You have to work your butt off compared to your other classes to get just a decent grade. Does not know how to teach.
This professor is useless. Gaurenteed poor grade if you dont work your butt off compared to all your other classes.

She\'s extremely down to earth and you feel as if a friend rather than teacher is teaching the class. Although she does demand a certain level of respect. She\'s funny and you will never be bored in class. She\'ll crack jokes with you. Yes she gives lots of essays, but...that\'s all for the best. I\'m better because of it. She\'s AWESOME!
